content:
(researched and revised by former Rector, a.k.a. Guidance team - @Jaynoel and @Marmoth90 specifically - thanks guys!)

 

Introduction to Tier-based Clearance Model

In Lodge, PvE content are done with a Tier-based clearance model: in a nutshell, each member of the guild is assessed and assigned a Tier-level, ranging from Tier-1 to Tier-4, based on their skills (primarily for Damage Dealers, in terms of dummy parses) and experience (for other two roles: Tanks and Healers, in terms of content they have cleared before). Members do group content based on their Tier-level: e.g. if one is of Tier-2 level, they can only do content of that Tier, or below (i.e. Tier-1, and -2).

For less-skilled, low-Tier members, this model serves as a roadmap to grow in (training, improving and as a result growing from Tier-1 all the way to Tier-4).

For high-skilled, high-Tier players it serves as a matchmaking system, to make sure they can put together an adequately skilled team to achieve high-difficulty content they aim for, thus eliminating the discontent within the rank and file (which happened to us, back in early 2019, when our high-skilled member-base stopped doing Midgame content altogether, because of the random groups who attempted high-end content and failed quite frequently).

This model - which in all honesty can easily be considered an element of elitism in some other guild - is a by-design, desired and enforced practice in Lodge of Sorceresses.

 

Description of Tiers

Below you can find DPS requirements for each Tier-level for Damage Dealers to take as a reference. Additionally, our main four guild ranks are based on these Tier-levels, which also are listed below. Last but not least, you can find the list of group content (Midgame - DLC vDungeons and vArenas, alongside with Endgame, the vTrials) assigned to each Tier. As mentioned before, a player of certain Tier-level can do the group content of their Tier or below:

  1. Tier-1 (Neophyte rank) requires 40k Trial Dummy DPS for clearance.
    Related content are: 
    • Craglorn non-HM vTrials
    • vICP + its HM
    • vWGT + its HM
    • vCoS + its HM
    • vRoM + its HM
       
  2. Tier-2 (Practicus rank) requires 50k Trial Dummy DPS for clearance.
    Related content are: 
    • Craglorn HM vTrials
    • vAS+0
    • vMoL
    • vCR+0
    • vSS
    • vBF + its HM
    • vFH + its HM
    • vSCP + its HM
    • vFL+ its HM
    • vMHK (non-HM)
    • vMoS + its HM
    • vDoM (non-HM)
    • vFV (non-HM)
    • vMF (non-HM)
    • vLoM (non-HM)
    • vIR (non-HM)
    • vDSA
       
  3. Tier-3 (Adeptus Minor rank) requires 65k Trial Dummy DPS for clearance.
    Related content are:
    • vHoF + HM
    • vCR+1
    • vAS+1
    • vMHK HM
    • vDoM HM
    • vFV HM
    • vMF HM
    • vLoM HM
    • vIR HM
    • vBRP
       
  4. Tier-4 (Adeptus Major rank) requires 75k Trial Dummy DPS for clearance.
    Related content are:
    • vMOL HM
    • vAS+2
    • vCR+2, +3
    • vSS HM

 

You can find full list of Guild Ranks here.
